segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Considerations
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Considerations

segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Considerations
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Considerations

segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Considerations
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Considerations

segment.source: Before you begin the deployment of Microsoft Application Virtualization, you might need to review your environment requirements, including the hardware and software requirements for installing the various Application Virtualization components.
segment.target: Before you begin the deployment of Microsoft Application Virtualization, you might need to review your environment requirements, including the hardware and software requirements for installing the various Application Virtualization components.

segment.source: Also, if you are upgrading from a previous version, the topics in this section provide information about upgrading your current Sequencer, server, and client versions.
segment.target: Also, if you are upgrading from a previous version, the topics in this section provide information about upgrading your current Sequencer, server, and client versions.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment Requirements
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment Requirements

segment.source: Provides general information about system requirements and upgrade considerations for your Application Virtualization deployment.
segment.target: Provides general information about system requirements and upgrade considerations for your Application Virtualization deployment.

segment.source: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Client
segment.target: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Client

segment.source: Provides step-by-step procedures for upgrading the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or the Application Virtualization Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).
segment.target: Provides step-by-step procedures for upgrading the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or the Application Virtualization Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).

segment.source: How to Upgrade the Servers and System Components
segment.target: How to Upgrade the Servers and System Components

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure you can use to upgrade the software components installed on all Application Virtualization System computers.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure you can use to upgrade the software components installed on all Application Virtualization System computers.

segment.source: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: How to Upgrade the Application Virtualization Sequencer

segment.source: Provides step-by-step procedures for upgrading the Sequencer on computers running Windows Vista or Windows XP.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step procedures for upgrading the Sequencer on computers running Windows Vista or Windows XP.

segment.source: How to Install the Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: How to Install the Application Virtualization Sequencer

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Sequencer.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Sequencer.
